mapper.insert: insert into size (s_num, s_size, s_r_price, s_w_price, s_max, s_space, s_view, s_bed, s_lounge, s_limit, s_care, s_bath) values(0, #{sSize}, #{sRPrice}, #{sWPrice}, #{sMax}, #{sSpace}, #{sView}, #{sBed}, #{sLounge}, #{sLimit}, #{sCare}, #{sBath})
mapper.update: update size set s_size=#{sSize}, s_r_price=#{sRPrice}, s_w_price=#{sWPrice}, s_max=#{sMax}, s_space=#{sSpace}, s_view=#{sView}, s_bed=#{sBed}, s_lounge=#{sLounge} s_limit=#{sLimit}, s_care=#{sCare}, s_bath=#{sBath} where s_num=#{sNum}
